mapper.select: SELECT ph.po_num po_header_num, pl.line_num po_line_num, pl.item_name, pl.quantity, l.accepted_quantity, ( pl.quantity - l.accepted_quantity ) can_accept_quantity, l.accept_quantity, l.accept_opinion_code, ( SELECT m.category_name FROM smdm_item_category m WHERE m.category_id = l.item_category_id ) item_category_name, ( SELECT su.uom_name FROM smdm_uom su WHERE su.uom_id = l.uom_id ) uom_name, pl.entered_tax_included_price po_unit_price, ( l.accept_quantity * pl.entered_tax_included_price ) amount, DATE_FORMAT( ll.need_by_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) needed_date, ( SELECT date_format( h.accept_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) FROM spuc_accept_list_header h WHERE h.accept_list_header_id = l.accept_list_header_id ) deliver_date, NULL AS budget_account_id, NULL AS cost_id FROM spuc_accept_list_line l, sodr_po_header ph, sodr_po_line pl, sodr_po_line_location ll WHERE l.source_line_id = pl.po_line_id AND pl.po_header_id = ph.po_header_id AND ll.po_line_id = pl.po_line_id and l.tenant_id=#{organizationId} and l.accept_list_header_id = #{acceptListHeaderId}
